net.derquinse.common.io

Class MemoryByteSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.io.ByteSink
      • net.derquinse.common.io.MemoryByteSink

  • @Beta
public final class MemoryByteSink
extends ByteSink
    Memory byte sink. Every time an atomic write operation is performed on the sink or an stream opened through the sink is closed, a MemoryByteSource is added to the queue.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OutputStream openStream() 
      BlockingQueue<MemoryByteSource> queue()
      Returns a view of the sink queue.

    • Method Detail

      • queue

        public BlockingQueue<MemoryByteSource> queue()
        Returns a view of the sink queue. All operations that add elements to the queue throw UnsupportedOperationException.
